text: Ma go Dimaadua hua ne helekai boloo, ‘Au gaa hai goe gii lliga i do huaidina mo ang gi o ehoo hagaaloho. Gei goe gaa mmada gi di hai o digaula huogodoo ala ga dadaaligi go nia goloo heebagi o nadau hagadaumee. Au gaa dugu anga digau Judah gi lala nia mogobuna o di king o Babylonia, gi lahia hunu gau gi hagaduadua ina i lodo dono henua, gei hunu gau gi daaligidia gii mmade.
